name: Iron Sickle
description: An efficient iron sickle designed for agricultural use, perfect for cutting grass and harvesting crops

name: Iron Chain Gate
description: A sturdy iron chain gate providing enhanced security for residential and commercial properties, featuring a rust-resistant finish.

name: Iron Window Grille
description: An intricately designed iron window grille, combining security with aesthetic appeal, ideal for enhancing the look of any window.

name: Iron skillet
description: A high-quality iron skillet, perfect for frying, searing, and baking, featuring excellent heat retention and a comfortable handle.

name: Iron fence
description: A robust iron fence providing security and aesthetic appeal to any property, featuring a rust-resistant coating for longevity.

name: Iron Door
description: A heavy-duty iron door designed for maximum security and durability, suitable for both residential and commercial use.
